episodes.title: CULT LIFE ESCAPED! w/ Amber & Trebles Garcia
episodes.description: Amber from Cult Life Escaped joins Paranoi Radio to expose the chilling truths behind the Jehovah’s Witness cult. She reveals the rituals, control tactics, and psychological tools used to keep members in line. A raw survival story turned mission, Amber sheds light on the hidden darkness to spread awareness and help others break free.
